snippet.title: Persona Series - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Persona 5 Royal, Persona 4 Golden, and Persona 3 Portable are coming to Xbox Game Pass, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, Windows PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Steam, and Nintendo Switch. 

Persona 5 Royal releases October 21, 2021.

#IGN #Gaming #Persona5
